articles.description: The Namibia women’s cricket team secured central contracts for the first time.
articles.content: Delighted at the announcement, CEO of Cricket Namibia Johan Muller said: For the first time, we have been able to professionalise the womens game. This is a significant moment for sports in the count… [+617 chars]
